comment.raw:
/**
 * The scrollbar root element or it's query selector.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * document.body
 */
comment.summary: The scrollbar root element or it's query selector.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Destroys the component.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * `true` on mobile
 *
 * @note
 *
 * This component only works on viewport-sized elements.
 */
comment.defaultValue: `true`on mobile
notes: This component only works on viewport-sized elements.

comment.raw:
/**
 * % of the scrollbar track to pad at the top and bottom.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * 0.2
 */
comment.summary: % of the scrollbar track to pad at the top and bottom.
